mapper.insert: insert into comment (article_uuid, content, userphone, create_time) values (#{article_uuid}, #{content}, #{userphone}, #{create_time})
mapper.select: select u.username, u.headimagepath, a.*, a.id as comment_uuid, (select count(*) from comment_favor b where a.id = b.comment_uuid) as favor_num, (select count(*) from comment_favor c where c.comment_uuid = a.id and c.userphone = #{userphone} ) as favor from comment a left join user u on a.userphone=u.userphone where article_uuid = #{article_uuid} order by create_time desc
select count(*) as num from comment where article_uuid = #{article_uuid}
select count(*) as num from article_favor where article_uuid = #{article_uuid} and favor = true
select * from comment_favor where userphone = #{userphone} and comment_uuid = #{comment_uuid}
mapper.insert: insert into comment_favor (comment_uuid, userphone, favor) values (#{comment_uuid}, #{userphone}, #{favor})
mapper.update: update comment_favor set favor = #{favor} where userphone = #{userphone} and comment_uuid = #{comment_uuid}
